name: ck-ms-di
description: This package provides a comprehensive dependency injection solution. The DI structure it offers allows you to use ‘singleton’, ‘transient’, and especially ‘scoped’ services. It also provides scope management for your services with a scoped lifecycle. This enables you to create independent scopes for each request in your API applications, the event triggers in ck-ms-events if you’re using it, and the consumer methods in ck-ms-queue if you’re using that as well, and to use your scoped services within these scopes.
author: CraftoKit Team - Mesut Kurak
